storyInfo: Shining honors her own promise before the Confessarii, and prepares to bring Nightingale back. The Followers' final member, Margaret, finally makes it to her friends.

attributes.content: Qui'saršinnag...
attributes.name: 'Mother'

attributes.content: Qui'saršinnag.
attributes.name: 'Mother'

attributes.content: Mama's here. It's alright, I just need to talk to your father for a bit.
attributes.name: 'Mother'

attributes.content: Didn't you want to look around outside?
attributes.name: 'Mother'

attributes.content: Just like the blue fowlbeast in your favorite story... the fowlbeast that can fly high up into the soft, lofty clouds.
attributes.name: 'Mother'

attributes.content: You can do it. You should live a free life.
attributes.name: 'Mother'

attributes.content: I'm sorry, my dear child...
attributes.name: 'Mother'

attributes.content: ...Mama will get you away from all of this.
attributes.name: 'Mother'

attributes.content: Qui'saršinnag.
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: Enough hiding. I know you're there.
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: You followed her in secret when she came to find me. You witnessed... everything. That's good.
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: You need not be afraid of the blood. You'll see much more in the future.
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: Will I die?
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: Of course, my dear. Look, this sword has pierced through my heart. It won't take long before the blood in this body dries up.
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: Your mother... wants to leave me because of some pointless delusions, and have you leave me as well...
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: But how is that possible? We have long been bound together by the myriad souls, we cannot be separated.
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: Go, child. Touch your mother... can you feel it? Her pulse.
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: This is the power of life, our cycle of life. Through rebirths like this, again and again, will our lives be perfected.
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: I will always be with you.
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: We... shall never part.
attributes.name: 'Father'

attributes.content: My dear Qui'saršinnag, you don't seem happy at all.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Didn't the experiment go smoothly? The receptacle has been responding perfectly from the last few tests.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: When the ceremony is complete, what will happen to her?
attributes.name: 'Daughter'

attributes.content: Her? You mean the... receptacle?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: When it was born, its soul was no longer with us.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: After all, the Leader has been researching for so long just to craft a cage from a pure consciousness, to trick the King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: When that happens, the King's power will be transferred to you, and the receptacle will be useless.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: You can decorate it like a doll if you like, and bring her wherever you go. I do like to collect souvenirs too.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: It is none of your concern.
attributes.name: 'Daughter'

attributes.content: Hah, you're always so impolite with me. Want it out of your sight? Just dispose of it. Or... you could give it to me?
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Leave. Do not step into my laboratory without my permission ever again.
attributes.name: 'Daughter'

attributes.content: Why are you so... offended? The Leader and you have such different temperaments... well, it's fine. You'll soon become as gentle as he is.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Who knows, I might even miss your current personality...
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.content: Goodbye, Qui'saršinnag.
attributes.name: Confessarius

attributes.text: She looks through her mask at the girl on the stone bed, who returns her gaze.
There is still work to do, and her father will not allow any delays.

This altar, this laboratory... and the bloodline she was born into together form a cage around her. In the face of the Confessarii's calling for the past several millennia, her sorrow and suffering are insignificant.
She does not control her own limbs, they are extensions of her father's will.
She cannot stop or leave this altar fiddling with life and death, nor can she drop the soul-engraving white sword in her hand.
Suddenly, a drop of water falls onto her busy hand.
Who is the one shedding tears here...? Her, or the figure on the bed, who should be completely unconscious?
'Qui'saršinnag.'
Distracted, she lifts her head, and sees a blue fowlbeast fly out of the cave and into the dusk outside.

attributes.content: Cracks appear on the cage.
A consciousness that should not exist, yearning for freedom it could not possibly have.
From this, hope is born.
A Confessarius and a pure white receptacle.
Qui'saršinnag and Liz.
Shining... and Nightingale.
I'm hearing a din of discontent.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Do not worry, Leader! Only a few enemies have broken into this place.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: They want to destroy the altar and stop the ceremony.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Annoying pests. Send someone to clean them up.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Surely I need not sully my hands with such trifles?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Of course not—
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: We shall eradicate all obstacles in your stead.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: The Confessarius Leader looks at the girl dressed in white. She's so deep in sleep on the stone bed that she almost looks like she is not breathing.
The 'Receptacle's' Originium Arts are stable, the ceremony will soon be complete.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: We're only a step away before Amnannam will open a path for you to the myriad souls.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: You will surpass the King of Sarkaz, supersede the myriad souls, and become the father of all Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: With our journey spanning thousands of years... this is how things should be.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Before that, I will have to reunite with my kin to witness it together.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Right on time, sister.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I have been waiting for you.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: More Confessarius guards incoming...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maryla, let's part ways here. I can't guarantee I'll be able to keep you and your companions safe in our next fight.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The roads should be safer once you leave this place. If you're willing to do so, you can continue heading east all the way out of Victoria.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Your Highness... I'll never forget your kindness, no matter where I end up!
attributes.name: 'Shopkeep'

attributes.content: But what are you guys planning to do?
attributes.name: 'Driver'

attributes.content: This blade of mine is still usable, if you need it.
attributes.name: 'Miner'

attributes.content: Don't worry, we have our own mission, and we're set on it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Please... take care of yourselves, and then... um, I hope you can live the life you want to live.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Your Highness...
attributes.name: 'Driver'

attributes.content: Maryla takes a step forward and kneels on one knee before Amiya. The other two follow suit, all three faces bearing a rare solemn look.
You've gained the undying loyalty of a... no, three Sarkaz.
attributes.name: 'Driver'

attributes.content: Huh? Please... you don't have to do this...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The mercenaries hesitate for a bit before turning to leave, fading from your view.

attributes.options: Good luck to them.;I hope Logos is doing well...

attributes.content: We have little time left, and the Confessarius altar is close.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Logos helped us dispel the Confessarius illusions, and I can feel an unsettling energy disturbance here...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: So are we going in loud?;Any secret passage to the altar or something similar?

attributes.content: Time isn't going to let us slowly figure a surefire solution.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We can't overlook the risks, but it's also important to take rational risks in our war strategies.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Fortunately, the Sarkaz have done as much, and sent all their troops to the front lines. So we need only deal with the Confessarius's men.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Theresis must trust Qui'sartuštaj a lot.;Why are the Confessarii in charge of the Amnannam advent ceremony?

attributes.content: The Confessarii play many roles in Kazdel. They are the King's advisers, bodyguards, shamans, and scholars.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They travel between the Royal Courts, and have always been dedicated to exploring Sarkaz history, and researching the power of their blood.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresis already planned to use the Shard to control Amnannam before invading Londinium, and the Confessarii definitely helped him out.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Qui'sartuštaj's plan to usurp the King is also closely tied to Amnannam.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: What does Amnannam have to do with the King?

attributes.content: Qui'sartuštaj wants more than just the crown.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He too, once possessed the King's power thousands of years ago.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He did not manage to get the full picture, but he definitely sensed the King's power to influence others.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'Control'. The more you experience absolute power, the harder it is to resist temptation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Be it Theresa or Amiya, Qui'sartuštaj has been watching every single King and their successors in secret for a long, long time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: His obsession with power compels him to extend his life by maniacal means without hesitation, just to seize control of that power once more.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There is only one thing that can let him achieve his goal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Through Originium, Qui'sartuštaj will be able to control the Sarkaz more than the King ever could.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Shining and Nightingale... are also victims of his.

attributes.content: They never stopped resisting their fate... especially at such a critical moment as now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: We have to stop Amnannam and its uncontrollable effects—;We have to stop the Confessarii from harming Rhodes Island's Operators—

attributes.content: Mon3tr, hold off our enemies.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya, destroy the altar.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, I'm sensing something's up...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can't quite control... the King's power...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That altar's influencing—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've told you before. We've been researching the Crown for thousands of years. But you? How long has it been since you learned how to use it?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: I welcome you all to bear witness to this grand ceremony.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: ...Qui'sartuštaj.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Everyone here is waiting for you.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: The Confessarius Leader smiles as usual, spreading his arms wide open as if welcoming his own child back after a long time away from home.
Dozens of Confessarii stand on both sides of the mountain path in silence.
Their eyes behind their masks hold fervent deference, completely ignoring the blood drenched Shining as she walks up the steps with her sword in hand.
I'm here to kill you.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: How could I... not know that?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Many years ago, mother showed up before father, before me, just like you have now.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: She always knew her own duty, and never thought to disobey me.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: But as you slowly grew, she developed a hatred to our family, the love I gave her... and the Confessarius's calling.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I don't blame her at all, nor do I blame you. You are the same. Merely made a tiny, forgivable mistake.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I will always accept you returning to my side.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: You are a monster. Who are you to speak of love?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Love and hate, life and death. They are fundamentally part of the same whole.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Generations of Confessarii have passed their souls down through the same rites. This is my way of loving my family.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Souls in death are purified in rebirth. Through death after death... we close in on the original, the purest and perfect being.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: There is not a shred of that worthy to be... perfect.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Qui'sartuštaj. Your true self died thousands of years ago.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The white horned King of Sarkaz who defeated countless enemies, the legendary hero who built an everlasting Kazdel under the day and night—is long dead.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: What stands before me now is but a despicable man who lives in the shadows, a coward who sacrifices the lives of innumerable innocents to prolong his own.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Who is it that tarnishes the soul of that original hero?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: It's you, King of Usurping Kings—You got so twisted seeking longevity. You are no longer worthy of that crown.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...Perhaps.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Qui'saršinnag... Sister.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I, who was born with all my memories intact... know better than you, the history Qui'sartuštaj bears with his life.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: The Confessarius Leader takes a step down.
He calmly looks at Shining, and holds her hand trembling in rage.
I know all too well the blood that is on my hands, as I remember all the love I have received.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: It was you who picked me up from the blood into your trembling arms when mother died.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: We are a true family, sharing the closest of blood, and sharing the closest of relationships.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: The nature of my soul may change, but the facts remain the same.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: How could you... talk about that like so...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Who was it...that killed my brother?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Who was it, that turned him from a child who should have received his mother's love... into a non-existence from the very beginning?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: It was me.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: For millennia, Qui'sartuštaj has... died time and time again from betrayal, from his closest kin.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: You may see this as a punishment if you wish it so.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: However... what does that matter?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: You call me unworthy of that crown, but who else but me could possibly lead the Sarkaz on a path to our survival?!
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Qui'lon brought our people on a wandering path of no return, and Yliš's retreat into hiding would only make us weak.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Even that pair of siblings, all they did was push Sarkaz into futile conflict, and let the crown slip into outblood hands!
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: The Sarkaz... need a true King, an eternal King.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I will reach our starting point, and together with the sins of Qui'sartuštaj and his blood, purge all of the Sarkaz's sins!
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.text: Sin.
The word intensifies the ire in Shining.
Her father and brother were both possessed by this undying monster—while she and her mother lived under the madness of his shadow.
To let him live, to kill him—both are afflicted with the curse.
She has no path to go.
She has nowhere to retreat.
But there is no way she can stay here as is.

attributes.content: ...Ugh!
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: You... made your move.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Very good... Qui'saršinnag...
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: ...I'll kill you.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: And then...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Kill yourself?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Is this what you call severing the bloodline's curse?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: The same stupidity I see.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Qui'sartuštaj grips Shining's sword with hand.
Blood trickles down the pure white blade and stains her hand.
A shudder rises from the depths of her soul.
—Ugh!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: An overwhelming force flings Shining onto a crystal tree.
The sharp black branches pierce through her abdomen.
Fresh blood gushes down, and converges with Qui'sartuštaj's blood.
The ancient tree long crystallized into Originium bursts a sudden pure white glow.
In just a moment, countless little moons rise to the top of the tree.
Every Confessarius begins to sing—

attributes.text: The myriad souls lie prostrate.
Howling knocks on the door from beneath, tangible usurps the intangible.
The Black Crown imprisoned, the offender perpetually innocent.
Because kings are born before immortality.

attributes.content: Look, even injuries as grievous as this will not infect you—this is the power of the blood you resist.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Qui'saršinnag... I have been patient enough with you.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: But you stay stubborn, unwilling to accept all that belongs to you—your duty, power, glory.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: It's alright, just be good and stay aside, while I... complete the ceremony myself.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: A crown woven of thorns appears in his hand.
Moonlight shines onto the crown as it illuminates the crystal tree at the end of the steps.
In that spot lies a stone bed lined with dead branches, and a curled up figure Shining knows too well atop it.
Liz...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...Wake up.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Don't bother.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Her consciousness is not where you think it to be.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: She's inside the crown.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I promised you that I would mend her soul.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: You need only wear the complete crown, and you can be together forever.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Together forever... in your cage?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Shining shuts her eyes.
She strains to imagine... the time she spent together with Liz.
They run in the woods, hand in hand.
They cross the ice-cold creek together.
With Liz worn out on her back, she walks the road home.
Liz makes a small flower wreath and places it on Shining's head.
A small blue fowlbeast follows them the whole time, chirping a cheery tune over their heads.
It hovers, searches—and lands next to the sleeping white demon.
It does not know why Liz is sleeping, and anxiously pecks at her cheek with its little beak.
Until a black arrow pierces it.
The fowlbeast vanishes, leaving only a blue feather that lands on Shining's shoulder.
Enough.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: You know very well those are not her dreams.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Even if those memories were fabricated...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: They are fabricated, so why not accept your own power, and reshape her memory once more?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: Liz... is Liz.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: She should be free. I will never shape her soul as I please ever again.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Wishful thinking... Qui'saršinnag, my fragile child indulging in fantasy. You are that blue fowlbeast, thirsting for freedom, yet imprisoning yourself.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: I prepared everything for you, a perfect body, an ancient power, all you needed is to accept—
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: But you betrayed me, you abandoned everything that belongs to you, and then? What did you gain?
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: You sorely disappoint me.
attributes.name: Qui'sartuštaj

attributes.content: ...A new life.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I was reborn into a new life after leaving you.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Not as the Confessarius Qui'saršinnag, nor a puppet of my bloodline...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But as Shining...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...As a member of the Followers.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Blue feathers prick her wounds.
The slightest of stings momentarily rouses her from her bloodline-induced paralysis.
Come.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Now... is the time.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Find me. Find this tree.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: If it were you...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...You would certainly make it.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: An opening pierces through the crimson clouds.
The sunlight pours down—
Everything around her becomes increasingly brighter.
That's—
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what it is, just hold it back!
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: The ceremony has already begun, we can't let—Ugh! We can't stop it!
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Light.
Light and fog fills the air.
The sun descends from the sky to repel the clammy moonlight.
Sorry, the storm was too intense, so I took some time to locate you—
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Do you need a hand... Shining?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: ...I'm fine.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: But we have to save... Liz.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: And... stop Qui'sartuštaj.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Lend me your strength—
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: And dispel the darkness before my eyes.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Let's go together.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The road ahead of us... I'll illuminate our path.
attributes.name: Margaret
